BiblioEntry.Title: Parse tree based machine translation for less-used languages
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Parse tree based machine translation for less-used languages / Jernej Vičič and Andrej Brodnik

BiblioSet.Title: Metodološki zvezki
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Metodološki zvezki

BiblioEntry.Abstract: The article describes a method that enhances translation performance of language pairs with a less used source language and a widely used target language. We propose a method that enables the use of parse tree based statistical translation algorithms for language pairs with a less used source language and a widely used target language. Automatic part of speech (POS) tagging algorithms have become accurate to the extent of efficient use in many tasks. Most of these methods are quite easily implementable in most world languages. The method is divided in two parts; the first part constructs alignments between POS tags of source sentences and induced parse trees of target language. The second part searches through trained data and selects the best candidates for target sentences, the translations. The method was not fully implemented due to time constraints; the training part was implemented and incorporated into a functional translation system; the inclusion of a word alignment model into the translation part was not implemented. The empirical evaluation addressing the quality of trained data was carried out on a full implementation of the presented training algorithms and the results confirm the employability of the method.

BiblioEntry.Title: A practical approach to the 2D incremental nearest-point problem suitable for different point distributions
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: A practical approach to the 2D incremental nearest-point problem suitable for different point distributions / Mirko Zadravec ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Pattern recognition
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Pattern recognition
BiblioSet.Subtitle: the journal of the Pattern Recognition Society

Notes.Note: Soavtorji: Andrej Brodnik, Marcus Mannila, Merja Wanne, Borut Žalik

BiblioEntry.Abstract: In this paper we present a new practical approach to solve the incremental nearest-point problem in the plane. We used the proposed approach in industrial applications with a superior behaviour to the theoretically better solutions. The method efficiently avoids the requirement of initial randomization of the input points by splitting the plane in strips using a heuristic. Points in strips are stored either in (a,b)-skip lists or in (a,b)-trees. Testing of the algorithms at different point distributions shows that our algorithm, using proposed heuristic, is almost insensible to distributions of input points, what makes the algorithm very attractive for various engineering applications.

BiblioEntry.Title: Fuzzy urban traffic signal control - an overview
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Fuzzy urban traffic signal control - an overview / Alenka Malej, Andrej Brodnik

BiblioSet.Title: Elektrotehniški vestnik
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Elektrotehniški vestnik

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Izboljšanje sistemov za upravljanje mestne prometne signalizacije je eden cenovno najučinkovitejših načinov za izboljšanje prometnega pretoka skozi mrežo semaforiziranih križišč. Pri razvoju novih sistemov se zadnja tri leta poleg tradicionalnih metod, ki temeljijo na uporabi modelov prometnega pretoka, čedalje več uporabljajo nove tehnologije, ki vključujejo uporabo umetne inteligence. Raziskave so pokazale učinkovitost metahevrističnih metod. Posebna mehka logika, tudi v kombinaciji z optimizacijskimi metodami, ponuja fleksibilnost, prilagodljivost, upravljanje pri netočnih ingormacijah in v konfliktnih situacijah. Naredili smo pregled raziskav s tega področja

In the last years, there have been many attempts made to improve urban traffic signal contol systems as this is one of the most cost-effective ways to improve the traffic flow through a network intersections. Besides the traditional method for traffic signal control that are usually based on a traffic flow model, the development of new system started to consider the various emerging technologies including artifical intelligence. Application of metaheuristic methods has proven to be worth of being researched. One of them is particularly fuzzy logic when combined with methods for system optimization. It offers a greater degree of flexibility, adaptibility and above all the possibility of handling uncertain unformation and dealing with conflicting situations. We made an overview of the research that has been done so far in this area.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: traffic signal control /hybrid systems /fuzzy logic /distributed control

BiblioSet.Title: JE-LKS. Journal of E-Learning and Knowledge Society
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: JE-LKS. Journal of E-Learning and Knowledge Society

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Iteroperability is often seen only as a technological problem related to reusability. We would like to give interoperability a new role in the structure of the learning environment and in collaborative activities. For us interoperability is also connected with didactical semiotic and cultural aspects. It improves the interaction between the materials products with different tools, the construction of kaleidoscopic artifacts and the reflection on the learning process.

BiblioEntry.Title: Worst case constant time priority queue
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Worst case constant time priority queue / Andrej Brodnik ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: The Journal of Systems and Software
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The Journal of Systems and Software

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je predstavljena nova podatkovna struktura velikosti ▫$3M$▫ bitov, kjer je ▫$M$▫ velikost univerzalne množice, ki podpira izvedbo diskretne vrste sprednostjo. Če uporabimo to podatkovno strukturo in novo pomnilniško topologijo, lahko izvedemo vse operacije diskretne vrste s prednostjo v času ▫$O(1)$▫ v najslabšem primeru. S tem je pokazano, kako je lahko neobičajna a praktično izvedljiva pomnilniška arhitektura uporabljena za premoščanje preprek, ki jih postavljajo spodnje meje problem ter tako doseženo izvajanje operacij v konstantnem času.

We present a new data structure of size ▫$3M$▫ bits, where ▫$M$▫ is the size of the universe at hand, for realizing a discrete priority queue. When this data structure is used in combination with a new memory topology it executes all discrete priority queue operations in ▫$O(1)$▫ worst case time. In doing so we demonstrate how an unconventional, but practically implementable, memory architecture can be employed to sidestep known lower bounds and achieve constant time performance.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: computer science /data structure /discrete priority queue /split tagged tree

BiblioEntry.Title: Online routing in convex subdivisions
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Online routing in convex subdivisions / P. Bose ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: International journal of Computational geometry and applications
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: International journal of Computational geometry and applications

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo sprotne algoritme za iskanje poti med dvema vozliščema ravninskega grafa. Pokažemo: (1) da obstaja brezpomnilniški usmerjevalni algoritem za poljubno trikotniško razdelitev grafa, ki tudi ne uporablja naključnosti, (2) da takšen algoritem ne obstaja za poljubno konveksno razdelitev grafa, (3) da ne obstaja konkurenčen sprotni algoritem za poljubno trikotniško razdelitev v grafih upoštevajoč evklidsko geometrijo, (4) da ne obstaja konkurenčen sprotni algoritem za usmerjanje upoštevajoč meritev razdalj v številu medsebojnih povezav, četudi je vhodni graf bodisi Delauneyeva požrešna bodisi trikotniška razdelitev z najmanjšo težo.

We consider online routing algorithms for finding paths between the vertices of plane graphs. We show (1) there exist a routing algorithm for arbitrary triangulations that has no memory and uses no randomization, (2) no equivalent result is špssible for convex subdivisions, (3) there is no competitive online routing algorithm under the Euclidean distance metric in arbitrary triangulations, and (4) there is no competitive online routing algorithm under the link distance metric even when the input graph is restricted to be a Delaunay, greedy, or minimum-weight triangulation.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: theoretical computer science /algorithms /online algorithms /oblivious algorithms /computational geometry

BiblioEntry.Title: Multiprocess time queue
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Multiprocess time queue / Andrej Brodnik, Johann Karlsson

BiblioSet.Title: Algorithms and computation : 12th International Symposium, ISAAC 2001, Christchurch, New Zealand, December 19-21, 2001 : proceedings
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Algorithms and computation / Peter Eades, Tadao Takaoka (eds.)
BiblioSet.Subtitle: 12th International Symposium, ISAAC 2001, Christchurch, New Zealand, December 19-21, 2001
proceedings

BiblioSet.Title: Lecture notes in computer science
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Lecture notes in computer science

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Opisana je izvedba omejene časovne vrste, ki jo upravljata dva procesa. Časovna vrsta je različica prednostne vrste elementov iz končne univerzalne množice. Eden od procesov ima časovno omejitev, da mora nekatere operacije izvesti v konstantnem času, medtem ko drugi proces izvaja vse operacije brez časovnih omejitev. Pokazan je postopek deamortizacije operacije "deleteMin" in kako zagotoviti vzajemno izključevanje med procesi pri delu na skupnih delih podatkovne strukture.

We show how to implement a bounded time queue for two different processes. The time queue is a variant of a priority queue with elements from a discrete universe. The bounded time queue has elaments from a discrete bounded universe. One process has time constraints and may only spend constant worst case time on each operation while the other process may spend more time. The time constrained process only has to be able to perform some of the time queue operations while the other process has to be able to perform all operations. We show how to do a deamortization of the deleteMin cost and to provide mutual exclusion for the parts of the data structure that both processes maintain.

BiblioEntry.Title: Membership in constant time and almost-minimum space
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Membership in constant time and almost-minimum space [Elektronski vir] / Andrej Brodnik, J. Ian Munro

BiblioSet.Title: SIAM journal on computing
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: SIAM journal on computing

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je predstavljen in obdelan problem shranjevanja podmnožic elementov iz univerzalne množice ▫${\mathcal M} = \{0, \ldots, M-1\}$▫ tako, da lahko izvedemo učinkovito poizvedovanje o članstvu v množici. Predstavljena podatkovna struktura je skoraj tako majhna, kot dovoljuje informacijsko-teoretični minimum, poizvedovanja pa lahko še vedno izvedemo v konstantnem času.

This paper deals with the problem of storing a subset of elemets from the bounded universe ▫${\mathcal M} = \{0, \ldots, M-1\}$▫ so that membership queries can be performed efficiently. In particular, we introduce a data structure to represent a subset of ▫$N$▫ elements of ▫${\mathcal M}$▫ in a number of bits close to the information-theoretic minimum, ▫$B = \left\lceil \lg {M\choose N} \right\rceil$▫, and use the structure to answer membership queries in constant time.

BiblioSet.Title: Computer communication review
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Computer communication review

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je predstavljena podatkovna struktura, ki je dovolj majhna, da jo lahko shranimo v predpomnilnik sodobnih mikroprocesorjev. Zato nam ustrezen algoritem, ki uporablja to strukturo, dovoljuje izvedbo Gbit/s usmerjevalnika.

We present a forwarding table data structure designed for quick routing lookups. Forwarding tables are small enough to fit the cache of a conventional general purpose processor. With the table in cache, a 200 MHz Pentium Pro or a 333 MHz Alpha 21164 can perform a few million lookups per second. This means that it is feasible to do a full routing lookup for each IP packet at gigabit speeds without special hardware.

BiblioEntry.Title: Architecture of KRPAN
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Architecture of KRPAN / Igor Benko, Andrej Brodnik

BiblioSet.Title: Elektrotehniški vestnik
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Elektrotehniški vestnik

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek obravnava delovanje organizacije, ki na informacijski prometnici posreduje informacije v obliki novic ali časopisa. V ta namen je predstavljena programska arhitektura in fizična ureditev KRPANa, jedra, ki nudi potrebno podporo za delovanje takšne organizacije. KRPAN je porazdeljen sistem, ki uporablja inteligentno kaširanje ("caching") za izboljšanje izrabe omrežja in diskovnega prostora. Z uporabo standardnih podatkovnih formatov lahko pri izdelavi KRPANa uporabimo široko paleto brezplačno dostopnih orodij. Konec članka se dotakne še nekaterih pravnih in etičnih problemov ter pokaže, kako KRPAN omogoča zadovoljivo odgovoriti na to vprašanje.

In the paper we address the operation of an agency that provides information in a newspaper-like form on the information highway. We describe the software architecture and the physical layout of KRPAN, a kernel that provides the support necessary to operate such an agency. KRPAN is a distributed system which employs intelligent caching to improve space and network utilization. The implementation of KRPAN relies on standardized formats of data which permits usage of commonly available tools. At the end we touch legal and ethical questions and describe how KRPAN helps to solve them.

BiblioEntry.Title: Comment of self-indexed sort
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Comment of self-indexed sort / A. Andersson, A. Brodnik

BiblioSet.Title: SIGPLAN notices
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: SIGPLAN notices

BiblioEntry.Abstract: S.Y. Wang (1996) presented the self-indexed sorting method. Basically, the algorithm sorts ▫$n$▫ keys taken from the universe of ▫$m$▫ elements. We claim that the paper by Wang is based on some severe misunderstanding: the analysis is wrong; the algorithm is not new, it can be found (with correct analysis) in many basic textbooks; the presenting "testing results" are misleading and they have very little to do with real execution time.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: computer science /computational complexity /self-indexed sorting method /algorithm /testing results /execution time

BiblioEntry.Title: Večopravilno okolje za delo v realnem času na računalniku IBM-PC
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Večopravilno okolje za delo v realnem času na računalniku IBM-PC / Vito Vouk, Jure Ferbežar, Andrej Brodnik

BiblioSet.Title: Informatica
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Informatica
BiblioSet.Subtitle: an international journal of computing and informatics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek opisuje osnovno okolje za pisanje večopravilnih programov na računalniku IBM-PC pod operacijskim sistenim MS-DOS. V ta namen smo razvili razporejevalnik procesorskega časa, ki uporablja urine prekinitve. Za medprocesno sinhronizacijo smo uporabili semaforje in izmenjavo sporočil. Uporabniku je na voljo modul podprogramv, ki nudi vse potrebne podprograme za delo v večprocesorskem okolju. V modulu so podprogrami za ustvarjanje, poganjanje, ustavljanje in izločanje ter podprogrami za nadzor procesov, podprogrami za komunikacijo med procesi (send, receive) in podprogrami za sinhronizacijo (wait, signal) ter ustrezni dodatni podprogrami za ustvarjanje, nadzor in izločanje semaforjev. Vsa programska oprema je napisana v programskem jeziku modula-2.

This article presents a multi tasking environment for the MS-DOS operating system on the IBM-PC computer. Real time scheduler was developed using real time clock interrupts to perform process scheduling. Interprocess communication is implemented using semaphores and message exchange. All the support routines for the multi-tasking real-time environment are packed in a single module which offers al the routines needed to handle process manipulation, process synchronization and interprocess data exchange. All the software is developed using Logitech Modula 2 environment.

BiblioEntry.Title: Optimal representation of sparse matrices
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Optimal representation of sparse matrices / Andrej Brodnik, Milena Kovač, Špela Malovrh

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je predstavljena podatkovna struktura, ki omogoča optimalen zapis matrik. Ta struktura je nato uporabljena pri razstavljanju sistema enačb mešanega modela za ocenitev disperzijskih parametrov genetskega materiala v zootehnologiji.

This paper introduces a novel data structure used to store sparse matrices optimally - minimizing the space of the matrix representation and the time complexity of an access to the matrix element. The size of our data structure is close to the information theoretic minimum - it differs in the second order term - and permits constant access to the matrix elements and a constant amortized time with a high probability for the insertion of a new element in the matrix and a deletion of an existing element. We tested our solution in a setup of mixed model equations that used for genetic evaluation of brending values and astimation of dispersion parameters. The coefficient matrices are large (over 1 mio. of equations) and sparse. The new algorithm reduced the number of access to the data structure (at most two access) and reduced the time for building the equation system, especially in the worst cases.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: computer science /data structures /sparse matrices /storing /time complexity /space complexity

BiblioEntry.Title: Trans-dichotomous algorithms without multiplication - some upper and lower bounds
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Trans-dichotomous algorithms without multiplication - some upper and lower bounds / Andrej Brodnik, Peter Bro Miltersen, J. Ian Munro

BiblioSet.Title: BRICS report series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: BRICS report series

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prispevku je predstavljen algoritem, ki omogoča iskanje v imeniku v času ▫$\sqrt{\log n(\log\log n)^{1+o(1)}}$▫ v modelu računanja, ki dovoljuje seštevanje, odštevanje, bitne Boolove operacije in premike v levo ter desno. Poleg tega je predstavljen tak algoritem za množenje ▫$w$▫-bitnih besed v času ▫$(\log w)^{1+o(1)}$▫, da je potreben čas za to operacijo ▫$\Omega(\log w)$▫, ter da je ▫$\Theta(\log\log u)$▫ potreben in zadosten čas za iskanje najbolj levega postavljenega bita v besedi.

We sow that on a RAM with addition, subtraction, bitwise Boolean operators and shifts, but no multiplication, there is a trans-dichotomous solution to the static dictionary problem using linear space and with query time ▫$\sqrt{\log n(\log \log n)^{1+o(1)}}$▫. On the way, we show that two ▫$w$▫-bit words can be multiplied in time ▫$(\log w)^{1+o(1)}$▫ and that time ▫$\Omega(\log w)$▫ is necessary, and that ▫$\Theta(\log\log u)$▫ time is necessary and sufficientfor identifying the least significant set bit of a word.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Programiranje z modulo-2 / A. Brodnik, M. Špegel, T. Lasbaher

BiblioSet.Title: Informatica
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Informatica
BiblioSet.Subtitle: an international journal of computing and informatics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku opisujemo programski jezik modulo-2. Opis je razdeljen na dva dela. Vprvem obravnavamo osnovne podatkovne, ukazne (stavki) in programske (moduli, podprogrami) strukture. Tako je podrobno opisan pojem modula in z njim povezanega modularnega programiranja v moduli-2. Nadaljevanje članka je namenjeno primerjavi module-2 s tremi drugimi dodobnimi jeziki: pascalom, ado in z jezikom C.

In this paper is a description of the Modula-2 programming language. The description is divided into two parts. In the first part, we discuss the essential data, control, and programming structures of the language which separate Modula-2 from other modern languages, concluding wise the notation of a module and modular programming, and some principles of system or low-level programming. In the second part of this contribution, Modula-2 is compared to other three modern programming languages: Pascal, Ada and C.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prispevku so opisane dejavnosti, katerih namen je z oblikovanjem aktivne učne skupnosti (Community of practice) učiteljev računalniških predmetov v srednjih šolah pripomoči k izboljšanju pouka računalništva in informatike v slovenskem šolstvu. Dejavnosti so potekale v sklopu dveh projektov NAPOJ in NAPOJ2. V okviru projekta NAPOJ smo povezali tri sisteme, ki jih učitelji uporabljajo pri poučevanju programiranja: e-učbenik, spletno učilnico in sistem za samodejno preverjanje pravilnosti programov Tomo. Projekt NAPOJ2, ki je v teku, pa se osredotoča na uporabo fizičnega računalništva z uporabo sistema Raspberry Pi kot motivacijskega elementa za poučevanje osnov programiranja. Izbrana je bila skupina učiteljev imenovanih mojstri učitelji, ki so v obeh projektih v sklopu večdnevne delavnice pripravili izhodiščno zbirko učnih gradiv. Temu so pri projektu NAPOJ sledile regijske delavnice, izvedene po vsej Sloveniji, na katerih so mojstri učitelji predstavili gradivo in idejo skupnosti. V sklopu projekta NAPOJ2 bodo pripravljena gradiva uporabljena na večjem številu šol, čemur bo sledilo več dogodkov. Na njih se bodo srečali tako učitelji kot dijaki, predstavili svoje projekte in si izmenjevali izkušnje glede uporabe fizičnega računalništva kot motivacije in medija za učenje programiranja.

In the article we describe activities to improve teaching of Computer Science in Slovenian high schools through the creation of an active community of practice (CoS). CoS consists predominantly of high school Informatics teachers. The activities were carried out as a part of two projects: NAPOJ and NAPOJ2. In a project NAPOJ we interconnected three systems used for teaching of programming: an e-textbook, an e-classroom; and a system for automatic checking of programming code correctness Tomo. On the other hand, the currently running project NAPOJ2 is focused on increasing student's motivation for programming through a physical computing based on Raspberry Pi system. In both projects the initially selected group of teachers (master teachers) prepared the basic teaching material in a multi-day workshop. Based on the developed material in the project NAPOJ regional workshops were prepared throughout Slovenia. In the workshops, run by master teachers, also the idea of CoS was introduced. On the other hand in the project NAPOJ2, the prepared materials will be used in a larger number of schools, which will be followed by several events. At the events will meet both, teachers and students, presenting their projects and exchanging experience with a physical computing as a motivation for teaching/learning programming.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: In recent years, Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) has become one of the leading technologies for spatial data acquisition. Mounted on the aircraft, LiDAR systems are capable to perform over 200.000 measurements per second, recording over 10 points per m2, and achieving accuracy within 15 cm. In this paper we expose key issues raised by LiDAR data scanning and provide the solutions for accessing, visualizing and processing LiDAR points.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Z uvedbo devetletke, je računalništvo kot izbirni predmet spet ugledalo luč sveta. Kurikulum za pouk čaunalništva še ni bil opredeljen, učbenikov ali delovnih zvezkov za računalništvo ni bilo. V ospredje je prišla ideja o vključevanju informacijsko komunikacijske tehnologije v osnovno šolo, zaradi vedno večje odvisnosti človeka od njene uporabe. Nezadostno poučeni in nepripravljeni učitelji so morali pogosto prirediti učne cilje pomanjkljivim unim sredstvom in svojemu pomanjkljivemu znanju. Ker je računalništvo še vedno le izbirni predmet in se ga učenci udeležijo le po lastni izbiri, ga tako površno zastavljen šolski sistem še vedno zadržuje na stopnji krožka in ne priznava nepogrešljive vloge, ki jo ima v današnji družbi. Medtem je vodilna svetovna strokovna organizacija za področje računalništva in informatike ACM (Association for a Computing Machinery) pričela oblikovati navodila za poučevanje računalništva in informatike od vrtca do konca srednje šole, ki so jih tudi pričeli uporabljati v vrsti držav. Priporočila bi lahko uporabili tudi za opredelitev in prenovo učnih ciljev za poučevanje predmeta v Sloveniji. Postavlja se osnovno vprašanje: "Ali je slovenski kurikulum za računalništvo sploh dobro oblikovan?"

With the nine-year elementary school, Computer Science re-appeared as an elective subject. However, there was virtually no curriculum for Computer Science to be used, no textbook, no exercise book. There was only an idea to include information and communication technology in the elementary school, because of society's growing dependence on it. Not properly trained and severely underprepared teachers had to adapt competency goals to the inappropriate teaching equipment. Because Computer Science is still only an elective subject and hence students attend it at their own will, the quality and importance of the subject is still at the level of an out-of-class activity not recognizing its indispensable role in the modern society. Meanwhile, the leading international professional society ACM (Association fora Computing Machinery) started forming guidelines for teaching curriculum for Computer and Information Science from Kindergarten to Grade 12 (K12) that are already used in several countries. The guidelines could be also used as a reference to define and renew competency goals for teaching in Slovenia. There appears a fundamental question: "Is the Slovenian curriculum for Computer Science well designed?"

BiblioEntry.Abstract: We study the Prefix Sum problem introduced by Fredman. We show that it is possible to perform both update and retrieval in ▫$O(1)$▫ time simultaneously under a memory model in which individual bits may be shared by several words. We also show that two variants (generalizations) of the problem can be solved optimally in ▫$\Theta(\lg N)$▫ time under the comparison based model of computation.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je obravnavana kakovost e-izobraževanja in kakovost elekltronskih učnih gradiv. E-gradiva se vedno pogosteje uporabljajo na vseh izobraževalnih ravneh, tudi pri zgodnjem učenju. Največkrat ežgradiva ustvarijo učitelji sami, saj zaenkrat ni resnih nacionalnih iniciativ in standardov, katerih rezultat bi bila splošno veljavna, standardno opisana, tehnološko primerna in vsebinsko usklajena e-gradiva. Pri vzpostavitvi sistema za objavo in izmenjavo e-gradiv so ključnega pomena ocenjevalni kriteriji za njihovo kakovost, ki bodo v članku podrobneje predstavljeni. V skladu z rezultati raziskave predlagamo, da se pri e-gradivu sistematično ocenjuje: učna vsebina (didaktika, učni cilji, učne metode, načini preverjanja znanja in ocenjevanja), uporabniški vmesnik pri uporabi gradiva (orientacija, možnost sledenja, navigacija, uporabniške storitve, podpora pri delu), kakovost izdelave (teksta, grafike, multimedije, čitljivost, pravilnost, nazornost in organiziranost predstavitve na ekranu) ter tehnična izvedba in kompatibilnost (enostavnost namestitve in priprave za uporabo, enostavnost uporabe, dostopnost, registracija, zagon in odstranitev).
BiblioEntry.TopicalName: Elektronska učna gradiva - Kvaliteta izobraževanja - Ocenjevalni kriteriji

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Glavni namen strategije e-izobraževanja je do leta 2013 vzpostaviti enega najuinkovitejših in v celoti informacijsko podprtih nacionalnih sistemov izobraževanja ter tako zagotoviti trajnostno gospodarsko rast, blaginjo in kakovost vseh državljanov RS, hkrati pa postati sinonim za eno najuspešnejših družb na svetu, temeljeih na znanju, stalnih inovacijah in hitrem razvoju. Glavna usmeritev je strateški dokument i2010, ki je nastal na nivoju EU-ja in definira bistvene poudarke pri razvoju informacijske družbe. Strategija e-izobraževanja sledi tudi vsem petim razvojnim prioritetam Strategije razvojaSlovenije (SRS). Še posebej je strategija e-izobraževanja usmerjena v uresnievanje druge razvojne prioritete "Izboljšanje kakovosti izobraževanja inspodbujanje vseživljenjskega uenja". Nacionalna strategija e-izobraževanja opredeljuje ve strateških podroij, katerih ukrepi bodo zagotovili hitrejši razvoj e-izobraževanja v Sloveniji, povean nivo znanja med prebivalstvom ter posledino boljšo konkurennost tako posameznikov kot celotne slovenske družbe. Nacionalna strategija e-izobraževanja obravnava vse družbene cilje skupine izobraževancev. Najuinkovitejši naini za dostop do znanja glede na potrebe posameznika morajo biti omogoeni vsem državljanom Republike Slovenije. Za uinkovito izvedbo ukrepov znotraj opredeljenih strateških podroij in zadovoljevanje potreb po znanju vseh družbenih slojev se predlaga ustanovitev "Agencije za e-izobraževanje", ki bo zagotovila uresnievanje zastavljenih ciljev nacionalne strategije e-izobraževanja. Kljune besede: e-izobraževanje, e-uenje, strategija e-izobraževanja, agencija za e-izobraževanje, strateška podroja, e-une vsebine, vseživljenjsko uenje, vzgoja in izobraževanje, informacijsko komunikacijska tehnologija, IKT, i2010, družba znanja.

The main purpose of the Slovenian national e-learning strategy is establishingone of the most effective and information supported national systems of learning thus enable constant economic growth, welfare and good life for all the citizens of Slovenia and at the same time become one of the most successful societies in the world, based on knowledge, innovations and constant development. Groundwork for Slovenian national elearning strategy were strategic EU document i2010 and Slovenian Development Strategy of which the strategy gives a special priority to its improving quality of education and lifelong learning. Slovenian National e-learning strategy defines different strategic fields, which will help assure faster development of e-learning in Slovenia, higher level of knowledge among population and therefore better competitive position of individuals and Slovenian society as a whole. The Strategy considers all social groups and claims that all Slovenian citizens must have the best accessto the knowledge according to their needs.

BiblioSet.Title: NOMS 2004
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: NOMS 2004 / 2004 IEEE/IFIP Network Operations and Management Symposium Application sessions, April 19-23, 2004, Seul, Korea

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Over the next few years the Public-Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) will evolve into NextGeneration Networks (NGNs), in which data and voice will sharea common packet-switched network. The NGN introduces new concepts and networking protocols for the 'everything over IP' strategy. The Softswitch, the Media Gateway and the Signaling Gateway are the basic elements of the current NGN architecture. In this paper we will show that these elements do not meet the requirements of some SS7 ISUP supplementary services that are widely used in telecommunication networks. The major drawbacks of the current NGN implementations that are based on those services will be investigated. To overcome the se drawbacks we propose a new element in the NGN architecture, called Multi-Service Mediator (MSM) and describe an interworking scenario with other currently defined NGN elements, especially with the Softswitch. We investigate requirenments for controlling and management of MSM in NGN. Additionaly we propose building block for simulation of NGN architecture, including MSM.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Predstavljen je poseben problem razvoza, v katerem sodeluje skupina taksi vozil, ki streže zahtevam po prevozu oseb med različnimi lokacijami. Predstavljen je model, ki omogoča preprosto spreminjanje dopustnih pojavov, in dve kriterijski funkciji. Opisana je hevristika, ki daje dopustno rešitev problema taksi razvoza.

A variation of the Vehicle Routing Problem in which a fleet of taxi vehicles service demands for point-to-point custumer transportation is introduced in this paper. A model that allows easy variation of feasibility conditions and two cost functions are presented. A heurestic algorithm that gives a feasible solution for the online taxi problem is introduced.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Priprava spletnih sestavkov postaja vedno bolj zapleten posel. Še posebej je težko opisati celoten sestavek in povezave med posameznimi stranmi v njem (struktura sestavka). V prispevku modeliramo celoten sestavek z uporabo usmerjenega grafa, ki sestoji iz vozlišč - posameznih strani. Pri realizaciji celotnega sistema uporabimo dobro znane tehnike iz predmetno naravnanega programiranja - zakrivanje, posploševanje in razstavljanje. V zaključku tudi pojasnimo, kako bi lahko naš sistem razširili še z uporabo dedovanja.

Building of web presentation is getting more and more complicated. In particular it is hard to describe complete presentation and connection between web pages (the structure of presentation). In contribution we model the whole presentation as a direct graph containing individual web pages as its vertices. In the implementation of the complete system we use well known techniques of object oriented programming - encapsulation, abstraction and modularization. In the conclusion we also describe how one can uppgrade our system using yet another techniques of object oriented programming - inheritance.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek predstavlja metodo, ki dopolnjuje osnovno idejo statističnega strojnega prevajanja z uvajanjem formalnih slovnic izvornega in ciljnega jezika in prevajanjem na ravni dreves izpeljave formalnih slovnic. Novi orodji nam omogočata upoštevanje dodatnega znanja o posameznem jeziku in jezikovnem paru. Poleg osnovnega statističnega prevajanja besed in besednih zvez, omogoča nov pristop tudi upoštevanje znanja ostalih jezikovnih ravni. Povedi so predstavljene z drevesi izpeljave formalne slovnice. Metoda je preizkušena na primeru uvajanja formalne slovnice besednih oznak. Empiričo je preverjana s pomočjo dvojezičnega označenega korpusa IJS-ELAN. Jezikovni par korpusa je slovenščina in angleščina.

We describe a method that enhances basic SMT (Statistical Machine Translation) idea with the introduction of source language formal grammar and target language formal grammar. New tools (grammars) enable usage of additional language knowledge. Along with basic word and word phrase translation (basic SMT translation), this method uses techniques and knowledge based on other language theory levels. Sentences are presented by parse tree of formal grammar. Methods was applied to an example of word classes, formal grammar symbols were presented as word classes. Method was empirically tested using a bilingual, parallel, annotated corpus IJS-ELAN. Corpus laguage pair is Slovene - English.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Obravnavamo problem upravljanja s tipično računalniško učilnico. Pri tem se posebej zavedamo zahteve po hkratni prisotnosti večih operacijskih sistemov na posameznih delovnih mestih, ker didaktični programi običajno obstajajo za različne operacijske sisteme. Druga zahteva sistema je čim preprostejše vzdrževanje, in ne nazadnje, tudi cena. Sistem zmodeliramo z uporabo storitev in celotno učilnico popišemo kot skupek strežikov, ki nudijo te storitve, in odjemalcev, ki jih uporabljajo.

We study the problem of typical computer lecture room. Among others we especially concentrate on two issues. The first one is that the didactical programs usually run under the wide variety of different operating systems and hence all of them should be supported on each working place. The second issue is managing and maintenance of the lecture room. We model the complete system using services and hence the lecture room consists of a number of servers, offering these services, and clients using the services.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Zbiranje podatkov v živinoreji poteka v različnih fazah proizvodnje, ki jih v informacijskem sistemu pokrivajo entitetni sklopi. Tok podatkov nam je osnova za prikaz relacij med entitetami v entitetnih sklopih. V odvisnosti drug od drugega gradijo podatkovno strukturo baze. V tem prispevku smo za ilustracijo gradnje IS prikazali entitetna sklopa REPRODUKCIJA, ki se pojavlja pri vseh domačih živalih in je najbolj kompleksen, ter PRIREJA MLEKA, kjer je dolžina laktacije odvisna od reprodukcije živali.

Data are collected on different districts in livestock production. These fields are colled aggregates in IS. Data streams are the core for ERD development. There are relations among entities shown for each aggregate. Aggregates are dependent of each other and together build common database structure. Aggregates REPRODUKCIJA (as the most frequent and complex module) and PRIREJA MLEKA (lactation is depended of reproduction cycle) are shown in this paper.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Prikazali smo korake informacijske analize, ki smo jih uporabili pri postavitvi informacijskih sistemov (IS) za več vrst domačih živali. Metodologijaa združuje načela podatkovno in procesno usmerjene analize sistema. V članku predstavljamo nov način opisovanja procesov v obliki procesnih diagramov, ki združujejo logične elemente razumljive informatiku in fizične elemente, ki jih razume rejec.

Information analysis procedures are presented in order to design Information Systems (IS) for livestock. Analysis is based on data and process oriented system analysis. New method for process implementation in the form of process diagrams is presented in the article. It involves logical elements and physical entities understandable to both, the system analyst and the breeder.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V vgrajenih računalniških sistemih se pogosto pojavi potreba po hranjenju podatkov, ki morajo biti obstojni (persistent) med več zagoni sistema. V prispevku opisujemo sistem za upravljanje s takšnimi podatki, ki omogoča razvijalcu programske opreme kar se da preprosto delo. Za dostop do podatkov sistem nudi posplošene reference, ki ohranjajo vrednost med zagoni. Opisujemo tudi primer povezave med našim sistemom in strojno opremo, v kateri se shranjeni podatki med zagoni ne spreminjajo (baterijsko podprti pomnilnik).

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je dobro znani problem poizvedovanja po IP naslovu v slovarju naslovov predstavljen iz formalnega zornega kota. Pokažemo teoretično hitrost poizvedovanja. Rezultat velja tako za programske kot za strojne rešitve. Na koncu so podane zakonitosti, ki jih mora upoštevati vsaka učinkovita rešitev (tako v jedru, kot na robu interneta). Podobne zakonitosti veljajo tudi za primere IPv4 naslovov, a jih je pri IPv6 potrebno še bolj upoštevati zaradi večjega naslovnega prostora.

The paper puts the well-known problem of the IP address lookup in a more formal framework. We show how fast (theoretically) we can perform the IP lookups at all. This holds for software and hardware solutions. At the end we propose a few rules that should be observed and used in any kind of solution to the problem (core or border routers and/or classifiers). The rules hold also for IPv4, but they should be even more observed in IPv6 because of the address size.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Dandanes postajajo na internetu aplikacije v realnem času vedno pogostejše. Kakovost teh aplikacij se posebej izboljša z zagotavjanjem omejitve zamud v dostavi podatkov in z zagotavljanjem odstotka prenešenih podatkov. V tem članku je predstavljen nov način obravnavanja prometa na posamezni povezavi. To obravnavo imenujemo pravočasna predaja (In-Time). Obravnava zagotavlja prioritetnemu prometu popoln pretok, preostalemu pa enakovredno obravnavo. Predstavljana rešitev, ki zahteva ▫$O(1)$▫ časa na paket, je bila tudi preverjena na omrežnem simulatorju.

Today, real-time applications are becoming common applications in the Internet. Such applications can benefit from guarantees on packet delays and lost-rate. We propose a new per-hop behavior, which we call the In-Time per-hop behavior, to provide such guarantees to prioritized application flows and allow excess traffic which is forwarded in-order with respect to the conforming traffic. Our proposed solutions which only needs ▫${\cal O}(1)$▫ time per operation per packet, has been evaluated using a network simulator.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Opisana je izvedba omejene časovne vrste, ki jo upravljata dva procesa. Časovna vrsta je različica prednostne vrste elementov iz končne univerzalne množice. Eden od procesov ima časovno omejitev, da mora nekatere operacije izvesti v konstantnem času, medtem ko drugi proces izvaja vse operacije brez časovnih omejitev. Pokazan je postopek deamortizacije operacije "deleteMin" in kako zagotoviti vzajemno izključevanje med procesi pri delu na skupnih delih podatkovne strukture.

We show how to implement a bounded time queue for two different processes. The time queue is a variant of a priority queue with elements from a discrete universe. The bounded time queue has elaments from a discrete bounded universe. One process has time constraints and may only spend constant worst case time on each operation while the other process may spend more time. The time constrained process only has to be able to perform some of the time queue operations while the other process has to be able to perform all operations. We show how to do a deamortization of the deleteMin cost and to provide mutual exclusion for the parts of the data structure that both processes maintain.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: This project involves system analysis in order to design information system in animal production. Existing information systems for Slovenian cattle, pig, horse, and rabbit population as well as commercial software were analyzed to derive entity-relationship diagrams (ERD). ERD was translated to relational tables described by data dictionary and model file. All attributes were given the name, data type, definition, and business rules for validity checks. Information systems were divided into twelve modules, while the common two modules were described in details. Module for Identification and registration covers origin, pedigree and movements from herd to herd of individually marked animals. The second module chosen was Database which includes database administration as well as auxiliary tables containing information about codes, partners, their jobs, and addresses. Common processes were developed as screen forms for inserting and querzing partner's data and existing codes.

Opisan projekt prikazuje uporabljene postopke sistemske analize, ki jih uporabljamo pri načrtovanju računalniško podprtega informacijskega sistema (IS) za potrebe živinoreje. Preučili smo obstoječe slovenske IS za govedo, prašiřče, konje in kunce kot tudi tržno usmerjeno programsko opremo. Na podlagi dobljenih podatkov smo izdelali entitetno-relacijske diagrame (ERD), ki smo jih prevedli v podatkovni slovar in v model podatkovne baze. Vse prilastke smo poimenovali, jim določili domeno, jih opisali ter vključili poslovna pravila za preverjanje njihove ustreznosti. Informacijske sisteme smo razdelili v dvanajst modulov, kjer smo podrobneje opisali skupna modula. Modul Identification and registration vključuje podatke o izvoru, poreklu in premikih iz črede v čredo posamezno označenih živali. Drugi izbrani modul Database zajema podatke o vodenju in upravljanju podatkovne baze, pa tudi pomožne tabele za vzdrževanje šifranta, partnerjev, njihovih vlog in naslovov. Skupna procesa smo dopolnili kot ekranski sliki za vnos in iskanje podatkov o partnerjih in obstoječih kodah.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prispevku je predstavljena nova podatkovna struktura velikosti ▫$3M + o(M)$▫ bitov. Struktura je uporabljena za reševanje problema "diskretne prioritetne vrste". Če uporabimo opisano strukturo z novo pomnilniško topologijo, dobimo rešitev v največ konstantnem času.

We present a new data structure of size ▫$3M+o(M)$▫ bits for solving the "discrete priority queue" problem. When this data structure is used in combination with a new memory topology it provides an ▫$O(1)$▫ worst case time solution. In doing so we demonstrate how an unconventional, but practically implementable, memory architecture can be employed to sidestep a lower bound (of ▫$\lg \lg M$▫) and achieve constant time performance.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek obravnava problem optimalnega razreza in polaganja kablov. Predstavljana je poenostavljana formalna definicija problema in pokazano je, da je problem računsko težak. Razvita je hevristika, ki je tudi testirana na primeru razreza in polaganja kablov ob avtocesti. Strategije reševanja tega problema se lahko osredotočajo na enkratno polaganje ali na zaporedje večih polaganj. Slednji tip strategij daje boljše rezultate.

A problem of an optimal layout of cables is discussed in the paper. A simplified formal definition of the problem is presented and it is pointed out that the exact solving is computationally hard. A heuristics is developed and tested on the data for highway installation. The strategies for solving the problem could be focused on one layout or a series of sequential layouts. On the average the second strategy gives better results.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V zadnjih letih se je močno razvila teorija vidljivosti. Objektom v ravnini ali prostoru priredimo tako imenovan graf vidljivosti, v katerem so vozlišča objekti, povezava med izbranima objektoma pa obstaja, če eden "vidi" drugega. V prispavku opišemo nekatere znane modele vidljivosti in navedemo primere za njihovo uporabo. Nato prikažemo, da je mogoče razviti teorijo vidljivosti popolnoma v okviru teorije grafov. Nov model vidljivosti na grafih je po modelski moči vsaj tako dober, kot katerikoli drugi že vpeljani model vidljivosti, saj je mogoče v njem izraziti vse znane modele, ima pa to prednost, da je končen.

In the last few years there has been an increasing interest in visibility representations of graphs. In such a representation the vertices of a graph are modeled by disjoint objects in the space and two vertices are connected by an edge if and only if the corresponding objects "see" each other. In this article we describe some known visibility models with applications in various fields. We show that it is possible to developed the visibility theory within graph theory entirely: we present a graph visibility model and show how to represent other known visibility models with the graph visibility model. The new model is thus as strong as any other known model, but its main advantage compared to other models is that it is finite.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prispevku je predstavljena nova podatkovna struktura velikosti ▫$O(M)$▫ bitov. Struktura je uporabljena za reševanje problema "razširjene prioritetne vrste". Če uporabimo opisano strukturo z novo pomnilniško topologijo, dobimo rešitev v največ konstantnem času.

We present a new data structure of size ▫$O(M)$▫ bits for solving the ▫$vEB$▫ problem. When this data structure is used in combination with a new memory topology it provides an ▫$O(1)$▫ worst case time solution.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je predstavljena podatkovna struktura, ki omogoča optimalen zapis matrik. Ta struktura je nato uporabljena pri razstavljanju sistema enačb mešanega modela za ocenitev disperzijskih parametrov genetskega materiala v zootehnologiji.

This paper introduces a novel data structure used to store sparse matrices optimally - minimizing the space of the matrix representation and the time complexity of an access to the matrix element. The size of our data structure is close to the information theoretic minimum - it differs in the second order term - and permits constant access to the matrix elements and a constant amortized time with a high probability for the insertion of a new element in the matrix and a deletion of an existing element. We tested our solution in a setup of mixed model equations that used for genetic evaluation of brending values and estimation of dispersion parameters. The coefficient matrices are large (over 1 mio. of equations) and sparse. The new algorithm reduced the number of access to the data structure (at most two access) and reduced the time for building the equation system, especially in the worst cases.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: computer science /data structures /sparse matrices /storing /time complexity /space complexity

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo sprotne algoritme za iskanje poti med dvema vozliščema ravninskega grafa. Pokažemo: (1) da obstaja brezpomnilniški usmerjevalni algoritem za poljubno trikotniško razdelitev grafa, ki tudi ne uporablja naključnosti, (2) da takšen algoritem ne obstaja za poljubno konveksno razdelitev grafa, (3) da ne obstaja konkurenčen sprotni algoritem za poljubno trikotniško razdelitev v grafih upoštevajoč evklidsko geometrijo, (4) da ne obstaja konkurenčen sprotni algoritem za usmerjanje upoštevajoč meritev razdalj v številu medsebojnih povezav, četudi je vhodni graf bodisi Delauneyeva požrešna bodisi trikotniška razdelitev z najmanjšo težo.

We consider online routing algorithms for finding paths between the vertices of plane graphs. We show (1) there exist a routing algorithm for arbitrary triangulations that has no memory and uses no randomization, (2) no equivalent result is špssible for convex subdivisions, (3) there is no competitive online routing algorithm under the Euclidean distance metric in arbitrary triangulations, and (4) there is no competitive online routing algorithm under the link distance metric even when the input graph is restricted to be a Delaunay, greedy, or minimum-weight triangulation.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: theoretical computer science /algorithms /online algorithms /oblivious algorithms /computational geometry

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku so predstavljene preproste, praktične in učinkovite podatkovne strukture za hranjenje eno razsežnostnih polj ▫$A[l...l+n-1]$▫, v katerih so shranjeni elementi enakih velikosti. Polja se povečujejo ali zmanjšujejo, če dodajamo ali odvzemamo elemente na enem oziroma obeh konceh. Poleg tega lahko tudi dostopamo do poljubnega elementa v polju. Vse operacije imajo časovno zahtevnost ▫$O(1)$▫, velikost dodatnega prostora (poleg ▫$n$▫ za hranjenje elementov pa je ▫$O(\sqrt{n})$▫, kar je optimalno.

We present simple, practical and efficient data structures for the fundamental problem of maintaining a resizable one-dimensional array, ▫$A[l...l+n-1]$▫, of fixed-size elements, as elements are added to or removed from one or both ends. Our structures are also support access to the element in position ▫$i$▫. All operations are performed in constant time. The extra space (i.e., the space used past storing the ▫$n$▫ current elements) is ▫$O(\sqrt{n})$▫ at any point in time. This is shown to be within a constant factor of optimal, even if there are no constraints on the time. If desired, each memory block can be made to have size ▫$2^k-c$▫ for a specified constant ▫$c$▫, and hence the scheme works effectively with the buddy system. The data structures can be used to solve a variety of problems with optimal bounds on time and extra storage. This include stacks, queues, randomized queues, priority queues, and deques.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku se sprehodimo skozi nekaj možnih javnih povezav, kot jih trenutno že uporabljajo sistemi Iskra Sistemi bodisi v laboratyorijskih bodisi terenskih instalacijah. Ogledamo si njihove tehnične karakteristike (propustnost, standardnost, ISO/OSI sklad na njih itd.) in cenovne karakteristike (cena investicije, cena obratovanja, cena vdrževanja). Na podlagi opisanih karakteristik lahko ocenimo, kako s pomočjo takšnih povezav izvesti osnovne funkcije potrebne za inteligentne sisteme v prometu.

In the main part of the article we study a list of public links curently used in the Iskra Sistemi products either in a laboratory or a real settings. We survey their technical characteristics (throughput, standardization, ISO/OSI stack implementation etc.) and their cost characteristics (investment, operation, maintance). Based on these characteristics we can describe how to implement basic functions needed and intelligent traffic systems.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Rešitev problema raznolikosti podatkov leži v njihovi standardizaciji - tako standardizaciji podatkov (njihove oblike, pomena itd.), kot načina njihovega prenosa. Standardizacija podatkov: poveča robustnost programske opreme, ker predpisuje tudi načine njenega formalnega preverjanja; poenostavi njeno vzdrževanje, ker je ista programska oprema instalirana na večih mestih in je popravek na enem mestu neposredno uporaben na vseh ostalih mestih; znižuje stroške izdelave. Standardizacija z drugimi besedami pomeni, da preidemo od enkratnih rešitev - butik izdelkov, k izdelkom za široko tržišče - k veleblagovniškim izdelkom.

The solution to the diversity of data problem is to standardize data (their syntax, semantic, etc.) and their transmition. This results in: improved robustness of the software, because standardization also defines formal methods to test the software; simplification of the maintenance, because the same software is installed in several places and a correction in any of them is directly applicable to all other places; decreases the production cost. To summarize, the standardization means the transformation from the highly specialized small production line - corner shop, into the industrial production line for a global market - the warehouse store.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prispevku je predstavljena zelo preprosta rešitev jedrnatega hranjenja razpršenih matrik. Pokažemo tudi, da je ta rešitev dovolj dobra. Uporabljena podatkovna struktura uporablja popolne razpršilne funkcije. Obravnavamo tudi soroden problem jedrnatega hranjenja grafov. Predstavljena rešitev omogoča hranjenje grafa v skoraj tako majhnem prostoru, kot ga zahteva informacijsko teoretični minimum, a kljub temu dovoljuje poizvedovanje v konstantnem času.

In this contribution we show that simple solution to the problem of storing a sparse matrix succinctly is good enough. The solution we study uses perfect hashing to store non-zero elements of the matrix. We also adress a related problem of storing a graph - a special case of the matrix storing problem. We show how to store the graph in the data structure which size is close to the information-theoretic minimum and the query time against it constant.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prispevku je predstavljen algoritem, ki omogoča iskanje v imeniku v času ▫$\sqrt{\log n(\log\log n)^{1+o(1)}}$▫ v modelu računanja, ki dovoljuje seštevanje, odštevanje, bitne Boolove operacije in premike v levo ter desno. Poleg tega je predstavljen tak algoritem za množenje ▫$w$▫-bitnih besed v času ▫$(\log w)^{1+o(1)}$▫, da je potreben čas za to operacijo ▫$\Omega(\log w)$▫, ter da je ▫$\Theta(\log\log u)$▫ potreben in zadosten čas za iskanje najbolj levega postavljenega bita v besedi.

We sow that on a RAM with addition, subtraction, bitwise Boolean operators and shifts, but no multiplication, there is a trans-dichotomous solution to the static dictionary problem using linear space and with query time ▫$\sqrt{\log n(\log \log n)^{1+o(1)}}$▫. On the way, we show that two ▫$w$▫-bit words can be multiplied in time ▫$(\log w)^{1+o(1)}$▫ and that time ▫$\Omega(\log w)$▫ is necessary, and that ▫$\Theta(\log\log u)$▫ time is necessary and sufficientfor identifying the least significant set bit of a word.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V tem prispevku je tehnični opis predloga informacijskega sistema za nacionalni sistem avtocest - HiNet. V prispevku so predstavljene skupine uporabnikov sistema z njihovimi potrebami in kratka ocena razmerja med ceno posluževanja teh potreb in njihovo ceno. V drugem delu prispevka je na kratko opisana arhitektura celotnega sistema. Opis arhitekture sestoji iz fizične (strojne) arhitekture, arhitekture programja in arhitekture aplikacije. Opis fizične arhitekture vsebuje opis komunikacijskih kanalov in njihovih povezav. Arhitektura programja upošteva zadnja dognanja v razširjanju informacij preko interneta, kot je npr. tehnika porivanja, in tako nudi potrebno delovno okolje celotnemu sistemu. Zadnja arhitektura opisana v prispevku je arhitektura aplikacije, ki odraža uporabnikov pogled na sistem - t.j. kako uporabnik dojema sistem.

In this contribution we describe the information system HiNet proposed for the national highway system. We identify different groups of users of the system, their needs and roughly estimate the cost-benefit relation for each group of the users. In the second part we describe the architecture of the complete system. The description is further split into the physical, software and application architecture each of which we briefly discuss. The physical architecture reflects available communication channels and their topology. The software srchitecture is tailored by using the recent results in information dissemination on the Internet such a push technology, and provides the necessary support for the complete system. The last architecture is application (or system) architecture which rwflects the users' point of view of the system - it reflects the application as perceived by the user.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je obdelan problem iskanja najbližjega soseda na diskretni mreži ▫$M\times M$▫ točk, kjer je ▫$M=2^m$▫ in je ▫$m$▫ velikost računalniške besede. Predstavljeni algoritem omogoča iskanje v normah ▫$L_\infty$▫ in ▫$L_1$▫ v konstantnem času in takorekoč minimalnem prostoru. Opisana je tudi razširitev na ▫$d$▫ razsežnosti.

We address the problem of a succinct static data structure representing points on ▫$M\times M$▫ grid (▫$M=2^m$▫, where ▫$m$▫ is a size of a word) that permits to answer the question of finding the closest point to a query point under the ▫$L_\infty$▫ or ▫$L_1$▫ norm in constant time. Our data structure takes essentially minimum space. These results are extended to ▫$d$▫ dimension under ▫$L_\infty$▫.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: The principal motivation of this work is the rather elegant form of the input output procedures to which one must resort in Modula-2 (compared to Pascal) due to the fact that input-output has been excluded from the language. Pascal's input-output procedures are rather powerfull because the number, type, and kind of parameters is not fixed. In other words, these procedures are polymorphic. We describe an implementation of dynamic polymorphism in Modula-2 which permits, among other things, a form of input-output procedures similar to Pascal's.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek predstavlja poskus uvedbe samodejnega sodniškega sistema v proces poučevanja programiranja. Pri tem se osredotočamo na dve fazi poučevanja: samopoučevanje in izvedbo tekmovanja iz programiranja. Izdelano ter predstavljeno je okolje izgrajeno v okviru eizobraževalno Moodle, ki vključuje sodniški sistem za samodejno preverjanje programerskih nalog. Slednji je transparentno umeščen v e-izobraževalno okolje Moodle. Okolje je bilo delno preizkušeno na letošnjem državnem ACM tekmovanju iz računalništva za srednješolce in na dveh generacijah študentov. Izvedena je bila tudi krajša anketa. V članku je predstavljeno tekmovalno okolje in objektivni rezultati ankete ter subjektivna mnenja obeh vrst uporabnikov, študentov - reševalcev nalog, asistentov ter profesorjev - snovalcev nalog in učnega procesa.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Osnovna namembnost računalnika je, da služi svojemu uporabniku - z drugimi besedami pravimo, da računalnik nudi storitve, ki jih uporabnik koristi. Nekateri znanejši primeri računalniških storitev so elektronska pošta, storitve spleta, računske zmožnosti pri reševanju velikih in zapletenih (optimizacijskih) problemov, kot je na primer obdelovanje borznih podatkov ter podobno. Nekatere storitve so za uporabnika pomembnejše in zanje je pripravljen plačati tudi več, če so le-te zanislivejše, hitrejše, neprestano dosegljive itd. Slednje dosežemo na preprost in cenen način z uporabo več računalniških sistemov. Ogledamo si, kako uporaben je v takšnih situacijah operacijski sistem Linux in kakšno programsko opremo nudi za vzporedno in porazdeljeno računanje. Predstavitev je osredotočena na potrebne tehnične osnove.

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Workbook
BiblioSet.Subtitle: 1995 TRIO/ITRC Researcher Retreat, May 2-4, 1995

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Information highway (IH) is becoming more and more importand medium for transfer of data in a modern society. Therefore a lot of discussion and research is made on the issues such as what should be offered on IH and how should a user (customer) access this information. This paper different as it analysis the other end of IH -- the source. In particular we are interested in an equivalent of a newspaper agency on IH.

BiblioEntry.Title: Računalništvo
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Računalništvo / [avtorji Andrej Brodnik ... [et al.] ; uredil Kazimir Rapoša]
BiblioEntry.SeriesInfoISBD: Leksikoni Cankarjeve založbe
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Leksikon opisuje in razlaga gesla in pojme, ki s kakorkoli vežejo ne računalništvo: zgodovina računalništva, strojna in programska oprema, računalniški pojmi, teoretične osnove računalništva. Vključena so tudi gesla, ki dokaj popolno pokrivajo nekatere veje matematike, ki so posebej pomembne v računalništvu, npr. numerična matematika, kombinatorika, teorija grafov, teorija verjetnosti in statistika, abstraktna in linearna algebra, logika in teorija množic.

Lexicon describes various terms connected to the computer science, including history of computer science, hardware, software, computing, theoretical computer science. Some mathematical fields used in computer science are also well covered: logic, set theory, graph theory, combinatorics, algebra, numerical mathematics, probability and statistics.

BiblioEntry.Title: Searching in constant time and minimum space : (minimæ res magni momenti sunt)
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Searching in constant time and minimum space : (minimæ res magni momenti sunt) / Andrej Brodnik
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: (minimæ res magni momenti sunt)

Publisher.PublisherName: Natural Science and Engineering Research Council of Canada
Information Technology Research Centre of Ontario

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Waterloo, Ontario (Canada) : Natural Science and Engineering Research Council of Canada : Information Technology Research Centre of Ontario, 1995
BiblioEntry.Abstract: This report deals with techniques for minimal space representation of a subset of elements from bounded universe so that various types of searches can be performed in constant time. In particular, we introduce a data structure to represent a subset of ▫$N$▫ elements of ▫${\lbrack}0,...,M-1{\rbrack}$▫ in a number of bits close to the information-theoretic minimum and use the structure to answer membership queries in constant time. Next, we describe a representation of an arbitrary subset of points on an ▫$M\timesM$▫ grid such that closest neighbour queries (under ▫$L_1$▫ and ▫$L_{\infty}$▫) can be performed in constant time. This structure requires ▫$M^2+o(M^S)$▫ bits. Finally, under a byte overlap model of memory we present an ▫$M+o(M)$▫ bit, constant time solution to the dynamic one-dimensional closest neighbour problem (hence, also union-split-find and priority queue problems) on ▫${\lbrack} 0,...,M-1{\brack}$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Small forwarding tables for fast routing lookups
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Small forwarding tables for fast routing lookups / Mikael Degermark ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.SeriesInfoISBD: Research reports / Luleå University of Technology ; 1997:02
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je predstavljena podatkovna struktura, ki je dovolj majhna, da jo lahko shranimo v predpomnilnik sodobnih mikroprocesorjev. Zato nam ustrezen algoritem, ki uporablja to strukturo, dovoljuje izvedbo Gbit/s usmerjevalnika.

We present a forwarding table data structure designed for quick routing lookups. Forwarding tables are small enough to fit the cache of a conventional general purpose processor. With the table in cache, a 200 MHz Pentium Pro or a 333 MHz Alpha 21164 can perform a few million lookups per second. This means that it is feasible to do a full routing lookup for each IP packet at gigabit speeds without special hardware.

BiblioEntry.Title: A new architecture to support database updates through views
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: A new architecture to support database updates through views / Andrej Brodnik, Frank Wm. Tompa
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Predstavljen je postopek popravljanja podatkov v podatkovni bazi skozi sistem materializiranih pogledov.

We describe a generalized approach to updates through views. In earlier studies, it has been shown that the update of a database on the basis of view updates is inherently ambiguous unless we impose impractical restrictions. Theproblem is worse if we are using materialized views. We propose a novel architecture which minimized the ambiguity problem. Althought this architecture was motivated by textual databases, the solution is most general and is simply applicable to relational or object oriented databases.

BiblioEntry.Title: The technology of object-oriented database systems : researh report CS-91-46, September 1991
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The technology of object-oriented database systems : researh report CS-91-46, September 1991 / G. K. Attaluri ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: researh report CS-91-46, September 1991
BiblioEntry.Abstract: There is now a reasonable consensus on what an object-oriented (OODBMS) database system must have in the way of features. Roughly, one obtains an OODBMS by adding a "non-procedural" guery language, secondary storage management and support for concurrency and recovery to an object-oriented programming language, such as C++ or Eiffel. Unfortunately, this cannot be accomplished by a straightforward marriage of existing database and compiler technology. From the point of view of relational database technology, new problems are introduced and most existing problems are made more complicated in some way -- problems on topics relating to query languages, constraint theory, storage management and object indexing, object clustering, query optimization, transaction processing, and so on, are all effected.Thera are five individual reports in the document -- one for each of the groups. The first is a proposals for complex object algebras and for query languages based on extensions to SQL; the second is a survey of typing in an OODBMS. The third report is a survey of recent proposals for concurrency control in cases where transactions are long duration, and where they also acces complex object structures. The remaining two reports concern storage management and semantic query optimization respectively. The order of presentation is not accidental; reports on topics relating more to conceptual issues are located prior to those on topics relating to internal isues. However, the reader should have no difficulty in understanding the contents of any of the reports in isolation -- each has been written independently of the others.

BiblioEntry.Title: Digital memory structure and device, and methods for the management thereof : United States Application 20020075734
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Digital memory structure and device, and methods for the management thereof : United States Application 20020075734 / James Ian Munro, Andrej Brodnik, Svante Carlsson
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: United States Application 20020075734
BiblioEntry.Abstract: A digital memory structure manages a subset N of a universe U={0 . . . .M-1 } of elements e, where the universe U is represented by a complete binary tree of height m+1 with elements e of the universe U at its leaves. The digital memory structure has an array of overlapped registers reg[i], preferably whereO i M/2-1, for storing internal nodes of the binary tree along respectivepaths from ancestors of the leaves to root. Location j of register reg[i] is arranged to store internal node k, preferably where k=(i div 2.sub.j)+2.sub.m-j-l). Any internal node of the binary tree is stored tagged, if the right and/or left subtree thereof contain(s) at least one element of subset N. The digital memory structure also has an array of pointers internal[l], preferably where 1 1 M-1, to the smallest element in the right subtree, and/or the largest element in the left subtree, of each respective ontemal node 1.

BiblioEntry.Title: Fast routing lookup system using complete prefix tree, bit vector, and pointers in a routing table for determining where to route IP datagrams : United States Patent 6266706
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Fast routing lookup system using complete prefix tree, bit vector, and pointers in a routing table for determining where to route IP datagrams : United States Patent 6266706 / Andrej Brodnik ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: United States Patent 6266706
BiblioEntry.Abstract: In a method of IP routing lookup in a routing table, comprising entries of arbitrary length prefixes with associated next-hop information in a next-hop table, to determine where IP datagrams are to be forwarded, a representation of the routing table is stored, in the form of a complete prefix tree, defined by the prefixes of all routing table entries. Further, a representation of a bit vector, comprising data of a cut through the prefix tree at a current depth, and an array of pointers, comprising indices to the next-hop table and to a next-level chunk, are stored. The bit-vector is divided into bit-masks and a representation of the bit-masksis stored in a maptable. Then, an array of code words, each encoding a row index into the maptable and a pointer offset, and an array of base addresses are stored. Finally, the lookup is performed.

BiblioEntry.Title: Brandväggsapparat och metod för att kontrollera nätverksdatapakettrafik mellan interna och externa nätverk : Patentskrift SE 513828 C2, 2000-11-13
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Brandväggsapparat och metod för att kontrollera nätverksdatapakettrafik mellan interna och externa nätverk : Patentskrift SE 513828 C2, 2000-11-13 / Sundstroem Mikael ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: Patentskrift SE 513828 C2, 2000-11-13
BiblioEntry.Abstract: A firewall, controlling network data packet traffic between internal and external networks, comprising filtering means, in dependence of the contents in data fields of a data packet being transmitted between said networks, selecting from a total set of rules a rule applicable to the data packet, whereby said packet is blocked or forwarded through the firewall. A 2-dimensional address lookup means performs a 2-dimensional lookup of the source and destination addresses of the packet in a set of address prefixes, each prefix having a subset of rules of the total set of rules, in order to find a prefix associated with said source and destination addresses, and rule matching means, performs - based on the contents of said data fields - a rule matching in order to find the rule applicable to the data packet.

BiblioEntry.Subtitle: nr. 9802415-1
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Malmö : Advokatbyrå Patentbyrå Ström & Gulliksson AB, 1998

Notes.IdNumber: Rubricerade nyansökning inkom till patentverket 1998-07-02 under nummer 9802415-1

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Patentirana je podatkovna struktura, ki je dovolj majhna, da jo lahko shranimo v predpomnilnik sodobnih mikroprocesorjev. Zato nam ustrezen algoritem, ki uporablja to strukturo, dovoljuje izvedbo Gbit/s požarnega zidu.

We patent a data structure designed for quick routing lookups used in IP traffic filtering. The data structure is small enough to fit in the cache of a conventional general purpose processor. This means that it is feasible to do a full IP filtering lookup for each IP packet at almost gigabit speeds without special hardware.

BiblioEntry.Subtitle: Svenska patentans nr. 9701726-3

Publisher.PublisherName: Fullmakt för patentbyrån Ström & Gulliksson AB

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Malmö : Fullmakt för patentbyrån Ström & Gulliksson AB, 1997
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Patentirana je podatkovna struktura, ki je dovolj majhna, da jo lahko shranimo v predpomnilnik sodobnih mikroprocesorjev. Zato nam ustrezen algoritem, ki uporablja to strukturo, dovoljuje izvedbo Gbit/s usmerjevalnika.

We patent a forwarding table data structure designed for quick routing lookups. Forwarding tables are small enough to fit the cache of a conventional general purpose processor. With the table in cache, a 200 MHz Pentium Pro or a 333 MHz Alpha 21164 can perform a few million lookups per second. This means that it is feasible to do a full routing lookup for each IP packet at gigabit speeds without special hardware.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: In front of you is the proceedings of the fifth StuCoSReC conference. The StuCoSReC is intended for masters & PhD students to show their research achievements. Socializing is also important and the conference is an excellent opportunity for students to get to know each other. The conference connects students of computer science and goes beyond the invisible limits of faculties. The uniqueness of StuCoSReC conference is that it is organized each year by different higher education institution. The University of Ljubljana - Faculty of Computer and Information Science is proud to host the conference this year.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 9th International Conference on Informatics in Schools: Situation, Evolution, and Perspectives, ISSEP 2016, held in Münster, Germany, in October 2015. The 17 full papers presented together with 1 invited talk were carefully reviewed and selected from 50 submissions. The focus of the conference was on following topics: sustainable education in informatics for pupils of all ages; connecting informatics lessons to the students' everyday lives; teacher education in informatics or computer science; and research on informatics or computer science in schools (empirical/qualitative/quantitative/theory building/research methods/comparative studies/transferability of methods and results from other disciplines).

BiblioEntry.Title: Data strucrures for bandwidth reservations and quality of service on the Internet
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Data strucrures for bandwidth reservations and quality of service on the Internet / Andreas Nilsson
BiblioEntry.SeriesInfoISBD: Licentiate thesis, ISSN 1402-1757 ; 2004:21

Notes.Dissertation: Luleå University of Technology, Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering, Division of Computer Science and Networking

BiblioEntry.Abstract: This thesis deals firstly with ways to solve the problem of limited resource reservations over time, and secondly, handling conforming traffic in routers. At first glance these topics seem a bit unrelated, they are both related to quality of service (QoS) on the Internet and are cases of Algorithm Engineering applied in the field of Computer Networking. In order to provide Quality of Service (QoS) for the users of mainly real time applications on the Internet, the need to make a reservation of bandwidth over the Internet has arisen. The idea of QoS is to provide the same quality of the service on the Internet as it is provided in the ordinary circuit switched telephone network. This means that an opened connection will never be disturbed by another connections no matter how many users there are using the phone network at the same time. Internet on the other hand is a packet switched network. That is a network in which small packets with address tags are transported from the source to the destination by several connected subnetworks. On the Internet there are no guarantees regarding unchangeable quality of service; packets may be dropped, delayed or reordered depending on the current load. This is undesirable for users of real time applications. One solution to achieve QoS on the Internet can be to reserve sufficient amount of bandwidth for a time period of resource use, for instance, the time of a phone call. Olov Schelén et.al. used the differentiated services approach to design a new architecture to provide QoS called "bandwidth brokers". In this architecture they provide virtual leased lines using the differentiated services to perform admission control through a system of bandwidth brokers. The bandwidth brokers work on per-hop basis and each bandwidth broker needs to maintain a database of the reservations made on its hop. It must be quick to: insert more reservations in the database; remove reservations already made; to query the amount of reserved bandwidth during a given interval in order to see if another reservation can be made so that not more bandwidth are reserved than the link capacity can carry. We talk about a "Bandwidth Reservation Problem" ("BRP"). Our solution to the problem is more general than just to be used with the bandwidth brokers. In the thesis we present two different solutions to the BRP; one static data structure using constant space and ▫$O(\log n)$▫ worst case time for all operations, and a dynamic solution using ▫$\Theta(n)$▫ space and ▫$\Theta(\log n)$▫ time for all operations, where ▫$n$▫ is the number of leaves in the tree. Note that the running time of the operations are not depending on the number of reservations, connections, or amount of reserved bandwidth. We also present an application of the dynamic solution in the field of chemistry where it is used to analysis of large spectral data sets. We also present a paper where a new set of forwarding behaviors is presented. That is a set of packet scheduling principles that can be used on the Internet to better achieve QoS.

BiblioEntry.Title: Get your priorities straight
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Get your priorities straight / Johan Karlsson
BiblioEntry.SeriesInfoISBD: Licentiate thesis, ISSN 1402-1757 ; 2001:34

Notes.Dissertation: Luleå University of Technology, Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering, Division of Computer Science

BiblioEntry.Abstract: This thesis deals with three different aspects of queues and buffers. First, how a novel memory architecture can improve a solution to the problem of supporting a priority queue with priorities from a bounded universe. Second, howwe can implement a time queue for two different processes which share parts of the data structure under mutual exclusion. Finally, how careful buffer management can be used to support a new forwarding strategy in network routers. The new forwarding strategy aims at better supporting of prioritized data flows with variable bit-rate.
